item.title: CVE-2022-26671|2024-09-17T00:31:07.808Z -- taiwan%20secom%20co.%2C%20ltd.%2C -- personnel%20attendance%20management%20system
item.description: Taiwan Secom Dr.ID Access Control systemâ€™s login page has a hard-coded credential in the source code. An unauthenticated remote attacker can use the hard-coded credential to acquire partial system information and modify system setting to cause partial disrupt of service.
